        <script type="text/javascript">
	var zUtilityNavWatchTimer;
	(function($){
		$("#mUtilityNav .watch")
			.on("mouseenter", function(e) {
				clearTimeout(window.zUtilityNavWatchTimer)
				$("#mUtilityNav .zWatchFlyout").show()
			})
			.on("mouseleave", function(e) {
				window.zUtilityNavWatchTimer = setTimeout(function(){
					$("#mUtilityNav .zWatchFlyout").hide()
				}, 250)
			});
	})(jQuery);
</script>

	(function($){
		if(jQuery('body').attr('id') === '_PageBody') {
			var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
			var script = document.createElement('script');
			script.type = 'text/javascript';
			script.src = '/assets/js/HSN/Service/CommerceService.js';

		//load the logo gif on doc ready as requested

          <!-- Brief:68864 --> 
          <style type="text/css">
#primary-navigation #todayspecial {
	position: relative;
	margin-top: 14px;
	padding-bottom: 4px;
}
#primary-navigation #todayspecial .zLink {
	font-size: 14px; line-height: 15px;
	color: #c90807;
	text-decoration: none;
}
#primary-navigation #todayspecial .zDemi { font-family: AvalonDemi; }
#primary-navigation #todayspecial .zMed { font-family: AvalonMedium; }
</style> 
          <div id="todayspecial" class="zHeaderPromo"> 
           <a class="zLink" href="/todays-special" manual_cm_re="header-_-promo-_-ts" manual_cm_sp="header-_-promo-_-ts"> <span class="zDemi">TODAY'S</span> <span class="zMed">SPECIAL</span> </a> 
          </div> 
          <input class="hDate" type="hidden" value=""> 
          <script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
	var noAjax = $('input#header-noajax').length > 0 ? $('input#header-noajax').val() : false;
	
	if (!noAjax)
	{
		var __ACstatus = function(data){
			var _d = new Date(data.serverTime);
			// Put data in .hDate for others to use
			$('.hDate').val(data.serverTime).data('utc',_d.getTime());
			delete _d;
			$("#todayspecial.zHeaderPromo .zText").show();
			//mark page as int
			(!!data.IsInternalRequest && $('html').addClass('is-int'));
		};
		if (HSN.OnAccountStatusLoad)
		{
			// 082416 - After Release this will be default
			HSN.OnAccountStatusLoad(__ACstatus);
		}
		else
		{
			HSN.Instance().Events.On(HSN.AccountNavigation.EVENT.ACCOUNT_STATUS_COMPLETE, __ACstatus);
		}
	}
	
	if (window.HSN && HSN.Instance && HSN.Instance() && HSN.Instance().FlyoutManager) {
		// Find existing TS flyout, and annihilate it
		$(HSN.Instance().FlyoutManager.Flyouts).each(function(){
			if (this.Url == "/headerfooter/todaysspecial")
				this.RemoveHandlers()
		})
	}
});
</script> 
         </div> 
        </div>

        <h1> <span id="product-name" itemprop="name">Smart Diet Portion-Control and Nutrition-Tracking Scale</span> </h1>

      <div data-disclaimer-info="area:13,position:13,typeid:7,contentid:3303" class="disclaimer13 clearfix">
       <p></p>
       <p><style> #inventor_story { width: 100%; } #inventor_story .AD_H2 { padding-bottom: 10px; font-size: 38px; font-family: AvalonBook; text-align: left; color: #cccccc; } #inventor_story .AD_H3 { padding-left: 4%; font-size: 24px; font-family: AvalonMedium; color: #333333; } #inventor_story .AD_Story { padding-left: 4%; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.31em; font-family: AvalonBook; color: #333333; } #inventor_story .AD_Left { width: 18.7%; float: left; border-radius: 50%; overflow: hidden; } #inventor_story .AD_Right { WIDTH: 81.3%; FLOAT: right; } #inventor_story .AD_Clear { clear: both; } .mobile #inventor_story .AD_H2 { display: none; } .mobile #inventor_story .AD_H3 { padding: 0px; margin: 0px; } .mobile #inventor_story .AD_Story { padding: 0px; } .mobile #inventor_story .AD_Left { display: none; } .mobile #inventor_story .AD_Right { width: 100%; padding: 4%; float: none; } </style> </p>
       <div id="inventor_story"> 
        <h2 class="AD_H2">INVENTOR'S STORY</h2> 
        <div> 
         <div class="AD_Left">
          <img alt="Nick Batsikouras" src="https://i04.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG55221_Nick-Batsikouras.jpg" width="100%"> 
         </div> 
         <div class="AD_Right"> 
          <h3 class="AD_H3">Nick Batsikouras</h3> 
          <p class="AD_Story">Dieting. Most everyone dreads the word, let alone the hassle that comes along with it. Nick Batsikouras understands that feeling. For years he struggled with his weight, losing pounds only to pack the right back on. One day, he did something smart by learning portion control and understanding the task of tracking calories. Using his own journey as inspiration, Nick set out to create the Smart Diet Scale to help others achieve their goals.</p> 
         </div> 
         <div class="AD_Clear"></div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
       <p>&nbsp;</p>
       <p></p>
      </div> 
     </div>

       <div id="overview-details" class="module"> 
        <div id="collapsible-details"> 
         <h2 class="title">Overview &amp; Details</h2> 
         <div class="info"> 
          <div id="overview" class=""> 
           <div class="overview-body"> 
            <div itemprop="description"> 
             <div class="content copy"> 
              <div> 
               <strong>Smart Diet Portion-Control and Nutrition-Tracking Scale&nbsp;</strong> 
               <br> Make sensible meal choices a cinch with this handy smart scale. Whether you're monitoring your portion sizes or tracking calorie content, fat content, carbs and protein to meet nutrition goals, it makes eating smarter easy. Just log into the Smart Diet Scale app to access info on thousands of foods, including grocery and restaurant items. Think of it as an education in eating better.
               <br> 
               <br> 
               <strong>What You Get</strong> 
               <br> 
               <br> 
               <ul> 
                <li>Smart Diet scale </li> 
                <li>4 Square plates </li> 
                <li>USB power cable</li> 
               </ul> 
               <br> 
               <strong>Good to Know</strong> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="related-content"> 
            </div> 
            <a class="cta" manual_cm_sp="productpage-_-BrandCallOut-_-AmericanDreams:528289" manual_cm_re="productpage-_-BrandCallOut-_-AmericanDreams:528289" href="/shop/american-dreams/13525">Shop all American Dreams</a> 
            <div class="more-info"> 
             <a href="#" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://img.hsni.com/images/content/pdf/528289_FAQ.pdf','PDF','height=500,width=500,menubar=no,status=no,toolbar=no,location=no,resizable=yes');">FAQ</a> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div id="details"> 
           <div class="content copy"> 
            <div> 
             <table class="dictionaryItems"> 
              <tbody>
               <tr> 
                <td class="key">Measurements:</td> 
                <td class="values"> <span>Approx. 10-1/2"L x 8-7/8"W x 1"H </span> </td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td class="key">Maximum Weight Capacity:</td> 
                <td class="values"> <span>11 lbs. </span> </td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td class="key">Power Source:</td> 
                <td class="values"> <span>4 AA batteries, not included </span> </td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td class="key">Material Composition:</td> 
                <td class="values"> <span>Glass, plastic and metal </span> </td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td class="key">Care:</td> 
                <td class="values"> <span>Wipe clean with a damp cloth </span> </td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td class="key">Country of Origin:</td> 
                <td class="values"> <span>China</span> </td> 
               </tr> 
              </tbody>
             </table> 
            </div>

         <div> 
          <div class="section-border"> 
           <h2 class="title">Features</h2> 
           <div id="features-tab" class="content copy"> 
            <div class="content copy"> 
             <div> 
              <strong>Perfect portion control</strong>
              <br> 
              <ul> 
               <li>4 portion-control plates teach you proper portion control sizes</li> 
              </ul> 
              <br> 
              <strong>Convenient 4-quadrant sensor design</strong>
              <br> 
              <ul> 
               <li>Lets you weigh your entire meal all at once with </li> 
               <li>No more having to weigh everything separately </li> 
               <li>Matches the way you really eat and build your meals </li> 
               <li>Makes for easy meal prepping</li> 
              </ul> 
              <br> 
              <strong>4 LED readouts</strong> 
              <ul> 
               <li>Provide easy weighing and tracking of your food</li> 
              </ul> 
              <br> 
              <strong>Smart Diet Scale app</strong> 
              <br> 
              <ul> 
               <li>Provides access to a large nutritional database with more than 650,000 food choices, including 450,000 grocery items and 106,000 restaurant items, pre-installed</li> 
               <li>Provides you with the nutrition facts for each portion, including calorie content, fat content, carbs and protein</li> 
               <li>You can also scan the barcode of a food item and get instant data</li> 
               <li>Over time, you can build a record of your nutrition intake, weight management and available calories</li> 
               <li>App will also store your recipes, making it easier to plan healthy meals</li> 
               <li>Set goals and limits to help you stick to your dietary goals</li> 
               <li>Super easy to log and weigh all your foods</li> 
               <li>Compatible with iPhone®, iPad® and iPod touch® with&nbsp;iOS 8.0 and above and Android devices&nbsp;with Android 4.4 and above&nbsp;</li> 
              </ul> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <a href="#" class="expand-button collapsible-details"><span></span></a> 
       </div> 
       <script>
    function FixTables(id) {
        var items = jQuery(id + ' div:only-child').last().children();
        var fullHeight = 0;

        items.each(function () {
            fullHeight += $(this).outerHeight();
        });

        var left = [];
        var right = [];
        var target = fullHeight / 2;
        var currentHeight = 0;

        items.each(function () {
            if (currentHeight <= target) {
                left.push($(this));
                currentHeight += $(this).outerHeight();
            }
            else {
                right.push($(this));
            }
        });

        if (left.length > 0 || right.length > 0) {
            var newLeft = $('<td />');
            var newRight = $('<td />');

            for (var i = 0; i < left.length; ++i) {
                newLeft.append(left[i]);
            }

            for (var i = 0; i < right.length; ++i) {
                newRight.append(right[i]);
            }

            var table = $('<table />');
            var row = $('<tr />');
            var tdleft = $('<td width="50%" />');
            var tdright = $('<td width="50%" style="padding-left: 10px;" />');

            tdleft.append(left);
            tdright.append(right);
            row.append(tdleft);
            row.append(tdright);
            table.append(row);

            $(id).html(table);
        }
    }

    function FixUnwrappedText() {
        $('#overview-details > .info *')
            .contents()
            .find(":not(iframe)").addBack()
            .filter(function () {
                return this.nodeType === 3 &&
                    $.trim($(this).text()) !== '' &&
                    //$(this).closest('a').length === 0 &&
                    $(this).parent('div').length === 1;
            })
            .wrap('<p>');
    }

    function RemoveEmptySpace() {
        $('#products-show.pd-v2 #overview-details > #collapsible-details br').hide();
        $('#products-show.pd-v2 #overview-details > #collapsible-details p').filter(function () {
            var text = $(this).text().replace(/\s*/g, '');
            return !text;
        }).hide();
        $('#products-show.pd-v2 #template-product-detail-brand p').filter(function() {
            var text = $(this).text().replace(/\s*/g, '');
            return !text;
        }).hide();
    }

    function ClearInlineStyle() {
        $('#products-show.pd-v2 #overview-details > #collapsible-details [style]').attr('style', '');
    }

    function CleanMoreInfo() {
        var moreInfo = $('.more-info');
        $('img[src*="btn_garment_measurements"]', moreInfo).remove();
        /*if (moreInfo.is(':blank')) {
            moreInfo.remove();
        }*/
    }

    jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            FixTables('#features-tab');
        
        FixUnwrappedText();
        ClearInlineStyle();
        CleanMoreInfo();
        RemoveEmptySpace();
    });
</script> 
       <script>
    window.accordiansInitd = false;

    $(function() {
        setTimeout(function() {
            var container = $('#template-product-detail');

            var fadedDetails = HSN.Template.PDCollapse({
                application : HSN.Instance(),
                contentBox : $('#collapsible-details', container),
                showButton : $('.expand-button.collapsible-details', container),
                eventScope : 'HSN.PDSection',
                initialCollapsedHeight : '300px'
            });
            fadedDetails.init();

        }, 250);
    });
</script>

By the end of the conversation I was in love with my scale. I will be buying one for my aunt. Thanks Nick Stephanie</p>

            <div class="helpful"> 
             <span class="rate-helpful">Was this review helpful?</span>

       <script type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        var container = $('#template-product-detail');
        var fadedReviews = HSN.Template.PDCollapse({
            application: HSN.Instance(),
            contentBox: $('#product-detail-reviews', container),
            showButton: $('.expand-button.product-detail-reviews', container),
            eventScope: 'HSN.PDSection',
            initialCollapsedHeight: $('#product-detail-reviews .header').height() + 'px',
            initialCollapsed: false,
            showFade: false
        });
        fadedReviews.init();
    });
</script>

    <script>
        jQuery(document).ready(function() {
            HSN.Template.LessmanScrollToTop.init({
                application : HSN.Instance(),
                container : document
            });
        });

        window.twttr = (function(d, s, id) {
            var t, js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if(d.getElementById(id)) {
                return;
            }
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";
            fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
            return window.twttr || (t = {
                _e : [],
                ready : function(f) {
                    t._e.push(f);
                }
            });
        }(document, "script", "twitter-wjs"));

        jQuery(window).on('load', function() {
            (function() {
                var po = document.createElement('script');
                po.type = 'text/javascript';
                po.async = true;
                po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js';
                var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
            })();
        });

        (function($) {
            function appendFunctions(function1, function2) {
                return function() {
                    if(function1) {
                        function1();
                    }
                    if(function2) {
                        function2();
                    }
                };
            }

            window.fbAsyncInit = appendFunctions(window.fbAsyncInit, function() {
                FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create',
                    function(href, widget) {
                        if(widget.id == "fb-pd") {
                           cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/product-facebook-like?cm_sp=Social-_-ProductPage-_-FacebookLike&cm_re=Social-_-ProductPage-_-FacebookLike', '');

                            $.ajax({
                                context : this,
                                type : 'POST',
                                url : '/facebook/like/8297639',
                                dataType : 'html'
                            });
                        }
                    });

                FB.Event.subscribe('message.send',
                    function(response) {
                        cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/product-facebook-like?cm_sp=Social-_-ProductPage-_-FacebookLike&cm_re=Social-_-ProductPage-_-FacebookLike', '');
                    });
            });

            // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15557155/jquery-capture-click-on-iframe
            (function() {
                var isOverIframe = false,
                    windowLostBlur = function() {
                        if(isOverIframe === true) {
                            // DO STUFF
                            isOverIframe = false;

                            window.cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/product-facebook-share?cm_sp=Social-_-ProductPage-_-FacebookShare&cm_re=Social-_-ProductPage-_-FacebookShare', '');
                        }
                    };

                $('#template-product-detail-sharing').on('mouseenter', '.fb-share-button iframe', function() {
                    isOverIframe = true;
                });

                $('#template-product-detail-sharing').on('mouseleave', '.fb-share-button iframe', function() {
                    isOverIframe = false;
                });

                $(window).blur(function() {
                    windowLostBlur();
                });
            })();

            window.gPlusAsyncInit = function(jsonParameter) {
                cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/product-googleplus-like?cm_sp=Social-_-ProductPage-_-GooglePlus&cm_re=Social-_-ProductPage-_-GooglePlus', '');
            };

            twttr.ready(function(twttr) {
                twttr.widgets.load();

                twttr.events.bind('tweet', function(event) {
                    cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/product-twitter?cm_sp=Social-_-ProductPage-_-Twitter&cm_re=Social-_-ProductPage-_-Twitter', '');
                });
            });

            $('#pin-button-container').click(function() {
                cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/product-pinterest?cm_sp=Social-_-ProductPage-_-Pinterest&cm_re=Social-_-ProductPage-_-Pinterest', '');
            });
        })(jQuery);
    </script> 
    <script>
    var productDetail;

    jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
        if(!Modernizr.touchevents) {
            HSN.Tooltip($("[data-tooltip]"));
        }

        productDetail = new HSN.Template.ProductDetail({
            application : HSN.Instance(),
            container : '#template-product-detail',
            windowLocation : window.location,
            defaultSort : 'rating',
            useV2 : true
        });

        $("[href='#template-product-detail-reviews']").click(function() {
            $('html,body').animate({ scrollTop: $("#template-product-detail-reviews").offset().top }, 'fast');
        });

        $('#template-product-detail-brand-signup-email-confirm').on("cut copy paste", function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
        });

        $('#template-product-detail-todays-special-signup-email-confirm').on("cut copy paste", function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
        });


        $(".matrix-selector").chosen();

        $('.matrix-selector').change(function() {
            var url = $("select option:selected").data('url');
            if(url) {
                window.location = url;
            }
        });
    });

    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
        
        new HSN.Carousel({
            carousel : '#template-product-detail-product .product-image-thumbnails-carousel',
            showPager : false,
            touch : Modernizr.touchevents,
            prevButton : $('#images-prev'),
            nextButton : $('#images-next')
        });
        new HSN.Carousel({
            carousel : '#template-product-detail-product .product-video-thumbnails-carousel',
            showPager : false,
            touch : Modernizr.touchevents,
            prevButton : $('#videos-prev'),
            nextButton : $('#videos-next')
        });
        new HSN.Carousel({
            carousel : '#multibuy .multibuy-image-thumbnails-carousel',
            showPager : false,
            touch : Modernizr.touchevents,
            prevButton : $('#multibuy-prev'),
            nextButton : $('#multibuy-next')
        });
        

        //Sends Event On Video Click
        jQuery('#template-product-detail-product').on('click', '.product-image-thumbnails .video, .product-video-thumbnails .video', function() {

            var videoData = $(this).data();
            var assetId = 0;
            if(videoData.rtmpUrl != null) {
                assetId = Number(videoData.rtmpUrl.match(/[-_\w]+[.][\w]+$/i)[0].split('.')[0]);
            }
        });
    });

    (function($) {
        $(document).ready(function() {
            HSN.SuggestEmail('#template-product-detail-todays-special-signup-email');
            HSN.SuggestEmail('#template-product-detail-brand-signup-email');
        });
    })(jQuery);
</script> 
   </div>

	/* Fix Personalized cell on order confirmation */
	#order_confirmation .right-column .Feature { width: 366px; }
	#footer-nav .col-hdr {
		font-family: AvalonDemi;
		font-size: 16px;
		color: #00a3e0;
		margin-bottom: 10px;
	}
	/*****************************/
	/* --- new footer styles --- */
	/*fix tv widget modal centering*/
	.tvp-modal-overlay { z-index: 110000; }
	.tvp-modal {
		display: flex;
		align-items: center;
		align-content: center;
		justify-content: center;
		z-index: 110001;
	}
	.tvp-hidden { display: none !important; }
	/*remove padding and box-shadow from footer tag*/
	footer { box-shadow: none !important; -webkit-box-shadow: none !important; padding: 0 !important; }
	/*footer styles*/
	footer .footer-outer { padding-top: 47px; }
	/*top border for community, not for blogs*/
	body.community footer .footer-outer { border-top: 2px solid #00a3e0; }
	footer .footer-inner {
		font-size: 0;
		border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6;
		padding-top: 10px;
		margin-top: 20px;
	}
	footer .footer-inner .col {
		display: inline-block;
		width: 33.333%;
		font-size: 12px;
		position: relative;
		vertical-align: top;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .col a { color: #666; }
	footer .footer-outer .col a:hover {
		color: #00a3e0;
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	footer .footer-inner .col-hdr {
		font-family: avalondemi;
		color: #00a3e0;
		font-size: 1.35em;
		line-height: 2;
		padding-top: 5%;
	}
	footer .footer-inner .col-hdr.footer-email-signup,
	footer .footer-inner .col-hdr.footer-hsn-card {
		padding-top: 4%;
		border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6;
		margin-top: 2%;
	}
	footer .footer-inner .col-hdr.footer-hsn-card > a > span {
		color: #00a3e0;
		margin-left: 10px;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}
	footer .footer-inner .col-hdr.footer-hsn-card > a > img { width: 20%; border-radius: 3px; }
	footer .footer-inner .col-sub {
		font-family: avalonmedium;
		font-size: 1.15em;
	}
	footer .footer-inner .col ul {
		font-size: 1.35em;
		line-height: 2.5;
		font-family: avalonbook;
		color: #666;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .legal-footer-outer { font-size: 13px; }
	footer .footer-outer .otherhsn-outer {
		background-color: #00a3e0;
		color: #fff;
		font-family: avalonbook;
		font-size: 1.2em;
		line-height: 2;
	}
	footer .footer-outer #otherhsn li > span { font-family: avalondemi; color: #fff; }
	footer .footer-outer #otherhsn a { color: #fff !important; padding: 0 10px !important; }
	footer .footer-outer #otherhsn li:last-child a { border-right: none; }
	footer .footer-outer #legal2 { margin-bottom: 30px; }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-icon {
		display: inline-block;
		height: 24px;
		width: 24px;
		margin-right: 10px;
		background-position: center;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		background-size: 100%;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .footer-icon.phone { background-image: url(//i03.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG00000-footer-phone-2.png?v=7); }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-icon.email { background-image: url(//i03.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG00000-footer-email-2.png?v=17); }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-icon.faq { background-image: url(//i03.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG00000-footer-faq-2.png?v=7); }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-asset-label {
		display: inline-block;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .socialRollOuter { display: none; }
	footer .footer-outer .socialRollOuter._show { display: block; }
	footer .footer-outer .socialRoll img { width: 75%; }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-top-cells { font-size:0; }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-top-cells .top-cell {
		display: inline-block;
		position: relative;
		width: 25%;
		font-size: 12px;
		border-right: 1px solid #e6e6e6;
		text-align: center;
		box-sizing: border-box;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .footer-top-cells .top-cell:last-child { border-color: transparent; }
	footer .footer-outer .footer-top-cells .top-cell span:first-child {
		display: inline-block;
		height: 0;
		padding-bottom: 25%;
		width: 100%;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		background-size: contain;
		background-position: center;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .footer-top-cells .top-cell span:last-child { display: inline-block; font-family: avalonmedium; line-height: 3; }
	/* email signup */
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container {
		position: relative;
		background:none;
		border: none;
		padding: 0;
		margin-top: 5%;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input[type=text],
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .signup-confirm-email {
		border: none;
		border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
		font-size: 1.7em;
		width: calc(100% - 5px);
		margin-bottom: 0;
		padding: 3% 0 0 5px;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-submit-btn {
		background-color: #fff;
		color: #00a3e0;
		border: 1px solid #ccc;
		border-radius: 3px;
		height: 32px;
		line-height: 1;
		font-size: 1.2em;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container label {
		display: block;
		color: #999;
		font-size: 18px;
		font-family: AvalonBook;
		position: absolute;
		pointer-events: none;
		left: 5px;
		top: 10px;
		transition: .2s ease all;
		-moz-transition: .2s ease all;
		-webkit-transition: .2s ease all;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .signup-confirm-email~label { display: none; }
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .signup-confirm-email[style^="display: inline-block"]~label,
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .signup-confirm-email[style^="display:inline-block"]~label {
		display: block;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .bottom-bar {
		position: relative;
		display: block;
		width: 100%;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .bottom-bar::before { left: 0%; }
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .bottom-bar::before,
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .bottom-bar::after {
		content: "";
		height: 1px;
		width: 0;
		bottom: 1px;
		position: absolute;
		background: #333;
		transition: .2s ease all;
		-moz-transition: .2s ease all;
		-webkit-transition: .2s ease all;
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input:focus { outline: none }
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input:not(:placeholder-shown)~label,
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input:focus~label {
		top: -12px;
		font-size: 13px;
		color: #999
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container > form > div { position: relative; margin-top: 6%; }
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input:not(.input-validation-error):focus~.bottom-bar::before {
		width: 100%
	}
	footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input.input-validation-error {
		border-bottom: 1px solid #c90807;
		border-left: none !important;
		border-right: none !important;
		border-top: none !important;
	}
	/* end new footer styles */

   <!-- Start repairs --> 
   <style type="text/css">
	/*video modal spacing*/
	body:not(.appTablet):not(.mobile) .modal [id^="hsn-video-player"] {
		width: 770px;
		height: 454px;
	}
	/*padding on the bottom of the torso*/
	#torso { padding-bottom: 37px; }
	/*override to force position all textcontainers*/
	.TextContainer { position: relative; }
	/*hsn2 header image on watch live page*/
	.watch-nav-container .hsn2-logo {
		background-image: url(//i04.hsncdn.com/desktop/pg_hsn2_top_v3.png?v=47);
	}
	/*replicant lb*/
	.cms-cell img[class$="-lb"],
	.cms-cell img, .spotlight-basic { -webkit-boz-sizing: content-box; box-sizing: content-box; }
	/* Responsive Cell - Dynamic Card Cells (2 or 4 white cells) */
	.cms-cell._dcc {
		background-color: #ffffff;
	}
	.cms-cell._dct {
		margin-top:3px;
	}
	.cms-cell._dcb {
		border-top: 1px solid #cccccc;
		margin-bottom:3px;
	}
	.cms-cell._dct._dcb { border-top: none; }
	.cms-cell._dce {
		border-right: 1px solid #cccccc;
	}
	.cms-cell._dct._dce {
		border-top-left-radius: 6px;
	}
	.cms-cell._dct._dco {
		border-top-right-radius: 6px;
	}
	.cms-cell._dcb._dce {
		border-bottom-left-radius: 6px;
	}
	.cms-cell._dcb._dco {
		border-bottom-right-radius: 6px;
	}
	.DynamicCardWrapper {
		float: left;
		width: 100%;
		background-color: #ffffff;
		margin: 3px 0px;
		border-radius: 6px;
		overflow: hidden;
		position: relative;
	}
	.DynamicCardWrapper .cms-cell {
		padding: 0px !important;
	}
	#arcade-today-special.widget .buy-button, #arcade-today-special-and-recently-aired.widget .buy-button {
		left: 0 !important;
	}
	#arcade-header .header-sticky {
		position: static;
	}
	#promo-top-bar-v2.arcade-promo {
		margin-top: 0;
		background-image: none;
		background-color: #fff;
	}
	/* PD page add to favorites button spacing in FF on soldout */
	#template-product-detail-product-soldout .info .add-to-favorites-buttton { margin-top: 0px !important; }
	/* Fix Social Buttons for IE 11 - MK 08/20/15 */
	#template-product-detail .social-sharing-container li { height: 50px; }
	/* #lessman-torso .social-sharing-container { width: 46px; } */
	#template-lessman-product-detail .social-sharing li { width: 40px !important; height: 40px !important; }
	#lessman-torso .tablet.social-sharing-container { width: auto; }
	/* Lessman label modal scrolling */
	.lessman-product-label-with-link { overflow-y: scroll; }
	/* make images with the cms device token still in the src invisible */
	img[src*="~!@#$DeviceRecipe~!@#"] { visibility: hidden !important; }
</style> 
   <script type="text/javascript">
	(function($){
		//override for grid feature resp text resizing and img token on grid pages on navigation
		try {
			var __tpg = $('body:not(.mobile):not(.appTablet)#CmsShops').find('#torso .grid-layout #template-product-grid');
			if(!!__tpg.length){
				var magObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations,instance){
					mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
						console.debug(mutation);
						if(!!$(mutation.addedNodes).filter('.grid-body').find('.TextContainer .rText').length){
							HSN.ResponsiveCells.prototype.TextResize('.TextContainer','.rText');
						}
						//need to break token apart in selector and regex so it doesn't get replaced, need to leave token together in the replace call so that it does get replaced and no device detection is required
						$(mutation.addedNodes).find('img[src*="~!@#$DeviceRecipe'+'~!@#$"]').each(function(i,v){
							v.setAttribute('src',v.src.replace(/(^http(s)*:)*(.*)(~!@#\$DeviceRecipe~!@#)(\$)(.*)/g,'$3desktop$6'));
						});

					});
				});
				magObserver.observe(__tpg[0], { attributes: false, childList: true, characterData: false });
			}
		} catch(er){}
		// Generic Global Variables
		window.zWebPID = jQuery("#webp_id").val();
		window.zPFID = jQuery("#pfid").val();
		// window.zPFID on Andrew PD Pages (v2)
		if (!window.zPFID){
			jQuery(document).ready(function() {
				var zTmp = jQuery("#template-lessman-product-detail .product-item-number");
				if (zTmp.length){
					window.zPFID = zTmp.text().replace("#", "").replace("-", "");
				} else {
					var zTmp = jQuery("#template-lessman-product-detail .lessman-mainimage img").attr("src");
					var zItem = /~\d+/.exec(zTmp);
					if (zItem && zItem.length){
						window.zPFID = zItem[0].replace("~", "");
					}
				}
			});
		}
		// Responsive Cell - Dynamic Card Cells (2 or 4 white cells)
		var DynamicCards = jQuery(".DynamicCard");
		if (DynamicCards.length){
			var Wrapper = jQuery('<div class="DynamicCardWrapper" />'); //compat only
			//DynamicCards.parent().wrapAll(Wrapper); //not req
			DynamicCards.parent().addClass('_dcc')
				.filter(':even:first').addClass('_dce _dct').end()
				.filter(':even:last').addClass('_dce _dcb').end()
				.filter(':odd:first').addClass('_dco _dct').end()
				.filter(':odd:last').addClass('_dco _dcb').end();
		}
	
		// Adjust Feature Cell Coremetrics
		var featureCM2 = function(){
			var _anchor, RE, SP, prefix = '',
				autoCM2 = {
					prefix: {ts:''},
					nums: ['two','three','four','five','six','seven','eight','nine','ten','eleven','twelve','thirteen','fourteen','fifteen','sixteen','seventeen','eighteen','nineteen'], //'one',
					elements: [],
					count: 0,
					cells: $('[manual_cm_re*="-cm2-"],[manual_cm_sp*="-cm2-"],[manual_cm_re*="-CM2-"],[manual_cm_sp*="-CM2-"]').closest('.cms-cell')
				};
			
			/*switch(true){
				//if the first cell is the feature ts, change first numbering element to ts
				case(!!$(autoCM2.cells[0]).find('.Feature.TS').length):
					autoCM2.nums[0] = 'ts';
				break;
				//if the first cell does not have a .Feature, start with featuretwo
				case(!$(autoCM2.cells[0]).find('.Feature').length):
					autoCM2.nums.shift();
				break;
			}*/
			autoCM2.cells
				.each(function(i,v) {
					prefix = (typeof(autoCM2.prefix[autoCM2.nums[autoCM2.count]]) == 'undefined' && 'feature') || '';
					$(v).find('a').each(function(_i,_v) {
						_anchor = $(_v);
						RE = _anchor.attr('manual_cm_re');
						SP = _anchor.attr('manual_cm_sp');
						if (!!RE && !!SP){
							_anchor
								.attr('manual_cm_re', RE.replace(/(features-_)-.*-(_-.*)/i,'$1-'+prefix+autoCM2.nums[autoCM2.count]+'-$2'))
								.attr('manual_cm_sp', SP.replace(/(features-_)-.*-(_-.*)/i,'$1-'+prefix+autoCM2.nums[autoCM2.count]+'-$2'));
						}
					});
					autoCM2.count++;
				});
		}
		featureCM2();

		// Arcade FunCentral change default active tab
		if ($("#fun-central-tabs").length){
			$("#fun-central-tabs #featured-game-tab").removeClass("active")
			$("#fun-central-tabs #featured-mission-tab").addClass("active")
			$("#fun-central-tabs #featured-game").removeClass("active")
			$("#fun-central-tabs #featured-mission").addClass("active")
		}
	
		// Import Content Page WebAnaytics Library as needed
		if(!!(/hsn\.com\/content\//i).test(window.location.href)){
		//if (window.location.href.indexOf("hsn.com/content/") >= 0){
			var v = Math.round(Math.random() * 100000000);
			document.write("<script type='text/javascript' src='https://img.hsni.com/images/prod/scripts/ContentPageWebAnalytic.js?v=" + v + "'><\/" + "script>");
		}
		// Fix Arcade TS Bug Price
		if((/\/arcade/i).test(window.location.pathname)){
		//if (window.location.pathname.indexOf("/arcade") == 0){
			(function ($) {
				// Hide immediately, until ajax call is done
				$("#arcade-today-special .price").css("display", "none");
				// We are going to use the TS bug flyout HTML to gather the price
				$.ajax("/headerfooter/todaysspecial", {
					dataType: 'html',
					data: {},
					success: function (data, status, xhr) {
						// Find the correct dollar sign in HTML
						var PricePos = data.indexOf('<li class="price">'),
							DollarSignPos = data.indexOf("$", PricePos),
							// 10 Characters starting with the dollar sign
							TestString = data.substr(DollarSignPos, 10),
							PriceText = /\$[0-9]*\.[0-9]*/;
						if (PriceText.test(TestString))	{
							var MyPrice = PriceText.exec(TestString),
								MyCell = $("#arcade-today-special .price");
							MyCell.html(MyPrice[0]);
							MyCell.css("display", "");
						}
					},
					error: function (xhr, status, error) {
						// In case something messes up, just make the current price visible again
						$("#arcade-today-special .price").css("display", "");
					}
				});
			})(jQuery);
		}
		// Fix webanalytic for arcade help page
		if((/\/arcade\/help/i).test(window.location.pathname)){
		//if (window.location.pathname.indexOf("/arcade/help") == 0){
			if (window.webanalytics){
				webanalytics.page.categoryid = "Arcade";
			}
		}
		// Doubleclick for Clearance
		if (window.location.pathname == "/shop/clearance/4525"){
			var axel = Math.random() + "",
				a = axel * 10000000000000;
			jQuery(window).on('load', function () {
				jQuery('#hsnlayout-doubleclick-iframe-b').attr('src', '//fls.doubleclick.net/activityi;src=3636840;type=categ527;cat=hsnca752;u4=NA;u3=NA;u2=SA;u1=n/a;ord=' + a + '?');
			});
		}
		// Redirect Mastercard page to Creditcard page
		if (window.location.pathname == "/myaccount/creditcard/HM"){
			$("#torso").hide();
			window.location.replace("/article/hsn-card-redirect/6629");
		}
		// Pull in script library for this set of pages ($ = Prototype here)
		if (window.location.pathname == "/cnt/hsn_today/hosts/default.aspx"){
			jQuery.ajax({ url: "https://img.hsni.com/images/prod/scripts/ShowHostScripts.js?v=1", dataType: "script", cache: true });
		}
		// Hide email signup form for community
		if (window.location.hostname == "community.hsn.com"){
			jQuery("#connect-web-links .CommunityHide").hide();
		}
		// 9-18-15 - Aetna Preorder Removal
		if((/\/products\//i).test() && window.zPFID && window.zPFID == 446393){
		//if (window.location.href.indexOf("/products/") >= 0 && window.zPFID && zPFID == 446393){
			jQuery("#template-product-detail-banner, #template-product-detail-product .info .preorder").hide();
		}
	})(jQuery);
	//====== document ready ======
	// All repairs that can wait until .ready go here
	jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
		
		//show the socialRoll icons
		setTimeout(function(){
			$('.footer-outer .socialRollOuter').addClass('_show');
		},1500);
		
		//accurately set the year in the footer
		HSN.OnAccountStatusLoad(function(dt){
			var d = new Date(dt.serverTime);
			$('#legal2 ._legal-year').text(new Date(d.getTime()-(5*60*60*1000)).getUTCFullYear());
		});

		// Fix personalized cell visibility on order confirmation page
		//jQuery("#shipping-billing-template div[offer-location='IP_confirmpg_rightrail']").css("visibility", "hidden")
		// Show one of the footer banners at random
		/*if($("#Footer_Promo").length > 0){
			var FooterPromoBanners = ["HSNCard", "Flexpay", "Arcade", "TS", "FreeShipping"],
				random_seed = Math.floor((Math.random() * 0.999) * FooterPromoBanners.length);
			$("#Footer_Promo_" + FooterPromoBanners[random_seed]).show();
		}*/
		//dont disable modals on arcade
		HSN.Modal.prototype.Enable();
		
		//lessman supplment to nuit text hack
		if($('.lessman-supplementfacts').length){
			// Most web id's, but some matrix # as well
			var x,
				LessmanSupWebIDs = [7668215, 7668400, 7668427, 7668543, 7668658, 7272381, 7272380, 7272388, 7272383, 7272382, 10066525, 7322778, 7322893, 7322900, 7322907, 7418567, 7418574, 7418624, 7121733, 7121741, 7121761, 7272385, 10067445, 10066628, 10063349];
			for (x = 0; x < LessmanSupWebIDs.length; x++){
				if ((window.zWebPID == LessmanSupWebIDs[x])){
					$('.lessman-supplementfacts h3').text('Nutrition Facts');
				}
			}
		}
		// CTRL + ; to copy item number to clipboard for IE only
		if (window.zPFID && window.clipboardData){
			document.onkeydown = function(event){
				if (!event){
					event = window.event;
				}
				//console.log(event.keyCode)
				// 85 is "u"
				// 186 is ";"
				if ((event.keyCode == 186) && (event.ctrlKey)){
					window.clipboardData.setData("text", window.zPFID);
				}
			}
		}
		// Fix Link ID "lnkReportIssue"
		$('#lnkReportIssue').on('click', function (e) {
			e.preventDefault();
			HSN.Instance().GetCSReportModal().Show('/customer-service');
		});
		// Grid page video player fix
		$('.tall-product-item').find('.video a').each(function( index ) {
			if(!$(this).data('w')){
				$(this).data('w', 156);
				$(this).data('h', 280);
			}
		});
		// Manage Communication Preferences link coremetric fix
		var x, ManageLink = jQuery(".be-the-first-know-manage-link"),
			ManageLinkLen = ManageLink.length;
		for (x = 0 ; x < ManageLinkLen ; x++ ){
			if (ManageLink[x].innerHTML == "Manage Communication Preferences"){
				ManageLink[x].onclick = function() {
					cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/myaccount/communicationpreferences?cm_sp=global-_-footer-_-managecommpreferences&cm_re=global-_-footer-_-managecommpreferences', 'homepage_footer');
				}
			}
		}
		// Lessman product "supplement facts" to "product label"
		var wID = window.zWebPID;
		if (wID == "7113679" || wID == "7113577" || wID == "7113681" || wID == "7113683" || wID == "7113689"){
			var SupplementFacts = $(".Supplement.Facts");
			if (SupplementFacts[0] && SupplementFacts[0].innerHTML.toLowerCase() == "supplement facts"){
				SupplementFacts[0].innerHTML = "Product Label"
			}
		}
		// Email Hinting
		HSN.SuggestEmail('#sale-alerts-panel-email');
		// Change default tab from Features to Overview
		if (window.zPFID && (window.zPFID == 288146 || window.zPFID == 278339 || window.zPFID == 278356)){
			var TabButton = jQuery('a[href="#template-product-detail-overview"].overview'),
				TabContent = jQuery("div#template-product-detail-overview");
			if (TabButton.length > 0 && TabContent.length > 0){
				jQuery(TabButton).parent().addClass("active").siblings().removeClass("active");
				jQuery(TabContent).addClass("active").siblings().removeClass("active");
			}
		}
		//fixes old ingrid product cards
		if ($('.in-grid-promo-cms-cell').length > 0) {
			$('.in-grid-promo-cms-cell').addClass('item product-item module violated')
				.removeClass('in-grid-promo-cms-cell')
				.attr('style','padding: 0 !important; height:365px !important; width: 241px !important;');
		}
		// Closed Captioning for quicklook video's on PD pages
		if (window.zWebPID){
			var videoUrlParse = $(".video[data-disttypeid='" + 2 +"']").data("rtmpUrl");
			if(videoUrlParse){
				var assetIdVideo = videoUrlParse.match(/([^\/]+)(?=\.\w+$)/)[0],
					quickvideoCaptions = "https://odv.hsn.com/customcontent/" + assetIdVideo + ".srt";
				$(".video[data-disttypeid='" + 2+"']").data("ccUrl", quickvideoCaptions);
			}
		}
		//sold out pd page hack
		if(window.zWebPID){
			if(window.zWebPID == 7418035){
				//check if soldout
				if($("#template-product-detail-product-soldout").length >= 1){
					var imgr = $('<img/>').attr("src", "https://img.hsni.com/images/prod/alpha/images/DG1909_042314_BS_PDBanner_SofiaVergara_SoldOut_v2.jpg");
					$(".add-to-favorites-buttton").html(imgr);
				}
			}
		}
		// Size chart default tab fix for several shoe items
		window.WaitForFitGuide = function(){
			if ($(".fit-guide-link").length){
				$(".fit-guide-link").data("default-page", "gm");
				clearInterval(window.WaitForFitGuideInterval);
			}
		}
		if((/\/products\//i).test(window.location.href) && window.zPFID){
		//if (window.location.href.indexOf("/products/") >= 0 && window.zPFID){
			if (window.zPFID == 349414 || window.zPFID == 349435 || window.zPFID == 349439){
				window.WaitForFitGuideInterval = setInterval(WaitForFitGuide, 250)
			}
		}
		// Professor Amos - Variant mixup fixing and Color Removing for PD Page
		if(window.zPFID && window.zPFID == 341099) {
			$("#template-product-detail-product .product-option-selector label").each(function(){
				if (this.innerHTML == "Citrus Zest"){
					//this.style.display = "none"
					this.innerHTML = "Scent: "
				}
			});
			$("#template-product-detail-product .product-option-selector .tabs").each(function(){
				if (this.innerHTML.indexOf("Color") >= 0){
					this.style.display = "none";
				}
			});
			$("#other-variant-first-group-0 label").first().click();
		}
		// For these WebID's / PFID's, remove "Extended Delivery" from the PD Page and PD Modals
		window.mExList = /(7590203|7433045|7433053|7433054|7433076|7433077|7433078|7433079|7433080|7433081)/;
		window.mExListPFID = /(381785|381786|371685)/;
		if ((window.zWebPID && mExList.test(zWebPID)) || (window.zPFID && mExListPFID.test(window.zPFID))){
			var mStatus = $(".product-modal-option-status");
			if (mStatus.text() == "Extended Delivery"){
				$(".product-modal-option-status").hide();
			}
		}
		window.Watcher_PdModal_ExtendedDelivery = function(){
			var ModalWebID = $(".modal #webp_id");
			if (ModalWebID.length && mExList.test(ModalWebID.val())){
				var mStatus = $(".product-modal-option-status");
				if (mStatus.text() == "Extended Delivery"){
					$(".product-modal-option-status").hide();
				}
			}
		}
		window.Watcher_PdModal_ExtendedDelivery_Interval = setInterval(Watcher_PdModal_ExtendedDelivery, 500);
		// Keith Urban Guitar Left/Right Handed v2
		// app footer article 1152
		if ( window.zWebPID && (/(7544220|7544189|7544155|7544145|10068879|10069711|7727007|7727032|7544704)/).test(window.zWebPID)
			&& !!$('input[data-label="Right Handed"]').length ){
			try {
				$('input[data-label="Left Handed"]').parent().insertAfter($('input[data-label="Right Handed"]').parent());
				$('input[data-label="Right Handed"]').parent().click();
			} catch(er){}
		}
		// Arcade link changes
		// Breadbox - Edit "My Missions"
		if (window.location.pathname == "/arcade"){
			$("#fun-central #breadbox #mission-central-modal").unbind().attr("href", "https://community.hsn.com/t5/Deleted-Posts/HSN-Arcade-Enhancements-for-2015/td-p/743026");
			$("#fun-central #breadbox #mission-central-modal span").hide();
		}
		// Blue bar
		if ($("#arcade-links-container").length){
			// Edit "My Missions"
			$("#arcade-links-container #mission-central-modal").unbind().attr("href", "https://community.hsn.com/t5/Deleted-Posts/HSN-Arcade-Enhancements-for-2015/td-p/743026")
			$("#arcade-links-container #mission-central-modal span").hide();
			// Remove "new arcade"
			$("#arcade-links-container .arcade-profile-links-item").eq(3).remove();
			// Edit for first link 
			$("#arcade-links-container .arcade-profile-links-item A").eq(0).attr('href','/arcade');
			// Edit "My Profile"
			$("#arcade-sign-in-container #arcade-profile").unbind().on("click", function(e){
				e.preventDefault()
				e.stopPropagation()
				window.location = "/profile"
			});
		}
		// End - Arcade link changes
		// 07-23-15 Fix arcade rewardid modal not displaying -mk
		if((/rewardid=3401/i).test(window.location.search) && window.location.pathname == "/rewards"){
		//if (window.location.pathname == "/rewards" && window.location.search.indexOf("rewardid=3401") >= 0){
			window.ArcadeRewardFixInterval = setInterval(function(){
				var Target = $("#sweep-entry-clock");
				if (Target && window.HSN && window.HSN.RewardCountDown && window.HSN.RewardEntryControls){
					// Show modal content
					$("div.modal.reward-entry > div").eq(1).css("opacity", "1.0");
					if (Target.text().indexOf("TIME LEFT") == -1){
						Target.hide();
						setTimeout(function() {
							// Get Max Entries
							var zMax = 1,
								MaxEntries = /Max Entries: (\d+)/.exec($(".cost-display").text());
							if (MaxEntries.length){
								zMax = parseInt(MaxEntries[1]);
							}
							var entryControls = new HSN.RewardEntryControls({ containerName: '#sweep-entry-container', possibleEntries: zMax, rewardId: '3401' });
						}, 500)
					}
					clearInterval(window.ArcadeRewardFixInterval);
				}
			}, 500)
		}
		// For elderly sweepstakes pages, nuke the header of the site
		if((/\/com\/sweepstakes\//).test()){
		//if (window.location.pathname.toLowerCase().indexOf("/com/sweepstakes/") == 0){
			jQuery("header").hide();
			jQuery("#leftBlock").hide();
		}
	// End of document.ready
	});
	// Facebook
	(function ($) {
		function appendFunctions(function1, function2) {
			return function () {
				if (function1){
					function1();
				}
				if (function2){
					function2();
				}
			}
		}
		window.fbAsyncInit = appendFunctions(window.fbAsyncInit, function () {
			FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create',
				function (href, widget) {
					if (widget.id == "fb-footer") {
						cmCreateManualLinkClickTag('/footer?cm_sp=global-_-footer-_-facebooklike&cm_re=global-_-footer-_-facebooklike', 'FacebookLike');
					}
				});
		});
	})(jQuery);
</script> 
  </footer> 
  <script>
    (function ($) {
        if ($('.socialRoll a[href*="twitter"]') != null)
            $('.socialRoll a[href*="twitter"]').click(function (e) {
                var that = this;
                e.preventDefault();

                window.location = $(that).attr('href');
            });

        if ($('.socialRoll a[href*="pinterest"]') != null)
            $('.socialRoll a[href*="pinterest"]').click(function (e) {
                var that = this;
                e.preventDefault();

                window.location = $(that).attr('href');
            });

        if ($('.socialRoll a[href*="instagram"]') != null)
            $('.socialRoll a[href*="instagram"]').click(function (e) {
                var that = this;
                e.preventDefault();

                window.location = $(that).attr('href');
            });
    })(jQuery);
</script> 
  <script>
        var dataLayer = [{

    "5.00"
  ],

    {
      "Name": "American Dreams",
      "Id": 13525
    }
  ],
  "product_brand_name": [
    "American Dreams"

  "product_brand_id": [

        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            HSN.DataLayer.helpers.pageCategorization({}, dataLayer[0].page_type, dataLayer[0].categories, dataLayer[0].product_brand_name);
            HSN.OnAccountStatusLoad(function (data) {
                dataLayer.push({ 'customer_email': data.emailAddress, 'customer_id': data.custId, 'customer_first_name': data.name, 'sid': data.sId });
                HSN.DataLayer.helpers.event(null, "hsn_event", "AccountStatus", "Complete", null, null, true);
            });
        });
    </script> 
  <div id="fb-root"></div> 
  <script>
    var HSN = window.HSN || {};
</script> 
  <script defer src="/bundles/common.6edd7a724645fd9f0d55.js"></script>
  <script defer src="/bundles/pd.8660ae743b0991509e69.js"></script> 
  <script>
            var productGrid;
            jQuery(function () {
                var gridInit = false;

                if ($('#template-product-grid').length > 0) {
                    productGrid = new HSN.Template.ProductGrid({
                        application: HSN.Instance(),
                        container: '#template-product-grid'
                    });
                    gridInit = true;
                }

                if (gridInit) {
                    $('ul.products .card').equalColumnHeights(4, 40);
                    $('ul.products').css('visibility', 'visible');
                }
            });
    </script> 
  <!-- Google Tag Manager --> 
  <noscript> 
   <iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-MC5JJQ" height="0" width="0" style="display: none; visibility: hidden"></iframe> 
  </noscript> 
  <script>
            jQuery(function() {
                (function(w, d, s, l, i) {
                    if (window.hsnDisableDataLayer) {
                        return;
                    }
                    w[l] = w[l] || [];
                    w[l].push({
                        'gtm.start':new Date().getTime(),
                        event: 'gtm.js'
                    });
                    var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                        j = d.createElement(s),
                        dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                    j.async = true;
                    j.src ='//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl + '';
                    f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-MC5JJQ');
            });
        </script> 
  <!-- End Google Tag Manager --> 
  <div id="global-messaging-widget-container"></div> 
  <script>
            (function ($) {
                $(document).ready(function () {
                    var service = HSN.Instance()._getWidgetService();
                    service.ShowGlobalMessaging({currentLocation: 'Product'}, {
                        callback: function (success, data) {
                            if (success) {
                                $('#global-messaging-widget-container').html(data);
                            }
                        },
                        scope: this
                    });
                });
            })(jQuery);
        </script>   
 </body>
</html>
